name: European Middle East Project vzw
goal: EuMEP is a small and independent NGO/think-tank in Brussels that closely monitors policy of the EU and European governments on the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. EuMEP promotes a just and effective policy towards both sides of the conflict based on the respect for international law and equal human dignity for all Israelis and Palestinians. EuMEP combines analytical work and advocacy, working closely with a number of other leading NGOs and experts.
interests: External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Trade
euInitiatives:
European Neighbourhood Policy;
EU bilateral relations with Israel and with Palestine;
Foreign Affairs Council Conclusions on the Middle East Peace Process;
EU humanitarian and development assistance for the Palestinians;
European Parliament resolutions on the Middle East Peace Process and related issues.
